data.text:
Demon Slayer season 4 episode 8 will air this weekend. The anime’s grand finale will set the stage for one of the most exciting arcs of the series, the Infinity Castle arc. This article highlights the details of the previous episode of Demon Slayer season 4.

Demon Slayer Season 4 finale episode to focus on final battle against Muzan

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 8 will be another extended episode running for 60 minutes. The episode will highlight the aftermath of Muzan’s iconic entry into the Ubuyashiki Mansion. This will pave the way for the upcoming arc of the anime, featuring major fights between the Upper Moon demons and the Demon Slayer Corps.

Moreover, it is plausible for the episode to contain various anime-original scenes to ensure a smooth transition from the Hashira Training arc to the Infinity Castle arc.

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 8 release date & time on Crunchyroll

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 8 will air on Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 8:45 a.m. PDT.

The following are the episode’s release date and time across the world:

Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 11:45 a.m. EDT

Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 4:45 p.m. BST

Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 5:45 p.m. CEST

Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 9:15 p.m. IST

Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 11:15 p.m. JST

Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 11:45 p.m. ACST

Fans can stream the episode on Crunchyroll.

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 7 recap

Demon Slayer season 4 episode 7 was an extended installment titled “Stone Hashira Gyomei Himejima.” The episode began with Gyomei Himejima narrating how he was almost executed for saving a young orphan from a demon, but only to be saved by Ubuyashiki.

Due to this experience, the Stone Hashira began distrusting children for their apparent self-centered nature. However, Tanjiro’s generosity revived his faith in the inherent innocence within children. Later in Demon Slayer season 4 episode 4, the protagonist visits Giyu, who fights against Sanemi Shinazugawa as part of their training. The interaction between Tanjiro, Sanemi, and Giyu is followed by Muzan Kibutsuji’s dramatic entrance into the Ubuyashiki Mansion.

The Demon Slayer season 4 episode 8 release date is Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 8:45 a.m. PDT.
